titles.title: Protect Our Physicians Act
Protect Our Physicians Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase access to mental health programs for physicians.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Protect Our Physicians Act
This bill exempts programs that provide certain mental health services for physicians from restrictions under the Stark law (i.e., the Physician Self-Referral Law).
